checks.noErrors: Message indicating that no errors exist for the specific service formula.

formulas.noFormula: Label indicating that the service does not have a matching formula.
formulas.title: Title of the page where service formulas are validated.

ranking.cardTitle: Title of the card indicating whether the ranked list of services is valid.
ranking.missingServices: Error message indicating services are missing in the ranked list of services.
ranking.title: Title of the section indicating the validation status of the ranked list of services.

services.title: Title of the area indicating the validation status of the service information.

structure.missingQuestions: Error message indicating a question is missing.
structure.questionCardTitle: Title of the section indicating the validation status of the questions.

survey.title: Title of the area indicating the validation status of the survey information.

accessibility.text: Link to a page that describes New York State's accessibility policy. Appears in the footer, ideally a single word but not more than two.

disclaimer.text: Link to a page that describes New York State's website disclaimer. Appears in the footer, ideally a single word but not more than two.

instagram.label: Describes a link to New York State's Instagram account. Not shown on the page (represented as an icon).

privacyPolicy.text: Link to a page with New York State's privacy policy. Appears in the footer, ideally a single word but not more than two.

title.label: Describes a link to the New York State social services website. Not shown on the page.
title.text: The footer title, usually the NYS agency name.

twitter.label: Describes a link to New York State's Twitter account. Not shown on the page (represented as an icon).

languageSwitcher.label: Label for the dropdown where the user can choose into which language the application should be translated.

logo.label: Label for going to the New York State Find Services home page. Used by screen readers for accessibility.

header.skipToContent: Link at the top of the page to skip to the main content of the page. Used by screen readers for accessibility.

htmlTitle.default: Text displayed in the browser tab when the user initially opens the application, or views any page without a custom page title.
htmlTitle.suffix: A suffix added to every message displayed in the browser tab.

actions.seeAllServices: Button to navigate to the ny.gov/services site to see all eligible services.
actions.startOver: Button to start the survey from the beginning.

error.label: Error message indicating that the user has navigated to an unsupported page.
error.text: Accompanying description indicating that the user has navigated to an unsupported page.
error.title: Title for the page which indicates to the user that they have navigated to an unsupported page.

print.htmlTitle: Text displayed in the browser tab when the user views the print page.

actions.email: Button to email your service list.
actions.print: Button to print your service list.
actions.share: Button to share your service list.
actions.startOver: Button to start back at the beginning of the survey.

apply.criteria: Header highlighting information describing additional criteria needed to apply for the service.
apply.howTo: Hyperlink to a given service's application.
apply.need: Header highlighting what a resident may need for their application.
apply.ready: Header highlighting how a user should go about applying.

error.htmlTitle: Text displayed in the browser tab when the user navigates to a report with invalid service information.
error.instructions: Accompanying text on the error page indicating to the user that they have navigated to a report with invalid service information.
error.title: Title for the error page that indicates to the user that they have navigated to a report with invalid service information.

report.htmlTitle: Text displayed in the browser tab when the user views their list of chosen services.
report.learnMore: Hyperlink to learn more about a given service.

message.disclaimer: Disclaimer about suggested services not indicating eligibility.
message.disclaimerLink: Message inviting a user to visit ny.gov/services, including a hyperlink to the website.
message.disclaimerLink_print: Message inviting a user to visit ny.gov/services, including the link inline (not as a hyperlink behind text). This is used for the printer-friendly version of the page so that the resident can see the website URL.
message.servicesRemoved: Alert displayed when a user previously saved a service that is no longer available.

report.recommend: Suggestion to resident to share their service list.

share.body: Body of email message that is created when resident chooses to email their services list. It includes a link back to the service list page and other relevant links.
share.emailLabel: Spoken label for the button to open an email draft, used for accessibility.
share.subject: Subject of the email message that is created when a resident chooses to email their services list.
share.text: Text used when a resident chooses to share their services using the built in share screen.

report.title: Header for the services list page.

actions.edit: Button to edit responses to a section of questions. Clicking the edit button navigates to that section of questions in the survey.
actions.next: Button to continue from the review page to see suggested services on the next page.
actions.restart: Button to start the survey from the beginning. Clicking this button navigates to the first page of the application.

review.htmlTitle: Text displayed in the browser tab when the user completes the survey and is reviewing their responses.
review.step: Label indicating which step in the survey the following section of questions correspond to.
review.title: Title of the review page summarizing what the resident answered.

actions.addToList: Button to add a service to the list of selected services
actions.hideMoreServices: Button that hides an expanded list containing one service description
actions.hideMoreServices_plural: Button that hides an expanded list containing more than one service description
actions.removeFromList: Button to remove a service from the list of selected services
actions.seeLess: Link to hide additional information in the card that displays information about a service
actions.seeMore: Link to see additional information in the card that displays information about a service
actions.seeMoreServices: Button that shows a collapsed list containing one service description
actions.seeMoreServices_plural: Button that shows a collapsed list containing more than one service description
actions.viewSaved: Button to view more information about the list of selected services, when there is only one selected service
actions.viewSaved_plural: Button to view more information about the list of selected services, when there are multiple selected services

additional.label: Subtitle for the list of services that may apply to the resident
additional.title: Title for the list of services that may apply to the resident

default.label: Subtitle for the list of services that may apply to the resident in the case when no services matched their responses
default.title: Title for the list of services that may apply to the resident in the case when no services matched their responses

everything.instructions: Instructions to the resident on how to view all available services
everything.title: Title for instructions to the resident on how to view all available services

services.htmlTitle: Text displayed in the browser tab when the user is selecting services to explore further.

info.category: Label for the type of service
info.criteria: Title for the section of information describing additional criteria needed to apply for the service

recommended.title: Title of the section of services whose criteria match the user's responses, when there is only a single matched service
recommended.title_plural: Title of the section of services whose criteria match the user's responses, when there are multiple matched services

status.selectServices: Message in the selected services bar, informing the user how to select and save services they're interested in

actions.back: Button to go back by one page in the survey.
actions.next: Button to go forward by one page in the survey.
actions.seeAllServices: Button to navigate to the ny.gov/services site to see all eligible services.
actions.step: Label indicating which step in the survey the user is currently on.

error.label: Label for the page indicating the survey information could not be loaded.
error.text: Accompanying text on the page indicating the survey information could not be loaded.
error.title: Title for the page indicating the survey information could not be loaded.
error.validation: Message displayed when the user tries to view the next group of questions before answering all questions in the current group.

intro.body: Instructions on the landing page for how to use this application.

howItWorks.stepOne: Additional information explaining what the user needs to do.
howItWorks.stepThree: Additional information explaining the end goal of the application.
howItWorks.stepTwo: Additional information explaining the final step at the end of the application.
howItWorks.title: Title for the section providing more detail about how the application works.

intro.title: Title on the landing page, indicating the purpose of the application.

boolean.error: Error message indicating the user has not selected an answer to the boolean question.
boolean.no: The negative answer to the boolean question.
boolean.yes: The positive answer to the boolean question.

number.error: Error message indicating the user has not entered a valid answer to the number question.
